name: James Francesco
description: I am an active and energetic man. My wife passed away in the past. I have one daughter . I am a successful Engineer expert. I am a free spirit, l’am a person who gives everything to my love ones, being with them in any situations, and will protect them like how l do for my self. I am not that kind of a man who speed all his time chatting, I am sometime busy with work.I am looking for a good caring and honest woman who will love me as l am, and my caring love will be unto her. I will be very excited to someday be with someone special but patiently waiting on God to bring about the right woman.I live in reality with a balance of truth and grace in relationship. I am not perfect and don’t want a relationship with someone who thinks they are, we do things in common,cooking going together go to the beach, shopping mall and having lots of funs together, cheerful and kind hear ted
